mapper.select: select * from qsw_profession where ${professionCnName} ORDER BY primary_score desc
select * from qsw_profession ORDER BY id asc
mapper.insert:
select REPLACE(UUID(),'-','')
insert into tt_markingOL ( ID, ANSWER_TIME, USER_ID, USER_IP, QUESTIONONE_MAIN, QUESTIONONE_ASSI, QUESTIONTWO_MAIN, QUESTIONTWO_ASSI, QUESTIONTHREE_MAIN, QUESTIONTHREE_ASSI, QUESTIONFOUR_MAIN, QUESTIONFOUR_ASSI, QUESTIONFIVE_MAIN, QUESTIONFIVE_ASSI, QUESTIONSIX_MAIN, QUESTIONSIX_ASSI, QUESTIONSEVEN_MAIN, QUESTIONSEVEN_ASSI, SCORE, RECOMMENDED_PROJECT, TRY_PROJECT ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer_time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionone_main,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionone_assi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questiontwo_main,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questiontwo_assi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionthree_main,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionthree_assi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionfour_main,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionfour_assi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionfive_main,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionfive_assi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionsix_main,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionsix_assi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionseven_main,jdbcType=DATE}, #{questionseven_assi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{score,jdbcType=DATE}, #{recommended_project,jdbcType=DATE}, #{try_project,jdbcType=DATE} )
